title: BRIEF-RIB Software places new shares at 14.25 euros in cap hike
text:
BRIEF-RIB Software places new shares at 14.25 euros in cap hike Sept 4 
Sept 4 Rib Software Ag 
* adhoc: rib software ag: placement of capital increase completed at a price of eur 14.25 per new share Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reporting By Thomas Atkins) Trending On Reuters
